'''Icy Rivers, Crimson Witch''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[Narukami Island: Tenshukaku|Signora]] without destroying either her Hearts of Flame or Eyes of Frost.
